overview: Richard Bradley “Rich” Iott (born October 25, 1951)[1][2] was the 2010 Republican nominee for United States Representative for Ohio’s 9th District. A lifelong resident of Ohio, he is a former grocery executive, and is presently a film producer and an active investor in a number of small businesses.
